bioconda.name: xtandem
bioconda.summary: X! Tandem open source is software that can match tandem mass spectra with peptide sequences, in a process that has come to be known as protein identification.

biocontainers.name: xtandem
biocontainers.summary: software that can match tandem mass spectra with peptide sequences

biotools.summary: Matches tandem mass spectra with peptide sequences.

bioschemas.name: XTandem
bioschemas.summary: Matches tandem mass spectra with peptide sequences.
